narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this first pre-license inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with applicant.
No regulated activity allowed until USDA license has been issued for a class A Breeder.
Send $ 30.00 check (or pay via credit card) and send documents to:  USDA APHIS Animal Care
